text: Gerolzhofen () is a town in Schweinfurt, Bavaria, Germany. The town is the earlier center of the district of Gerolzhofen. GerolzhofenStadtpfarrkirche2.JPG|Gerolzhofen core city Steigerwalddom, Marktplatz, Rathaus.jpg|Market place Ehemaliges Rathaus, Gerolzhofen, Marktplatz 20.JPG|Town hall ==Twin towns and cities== Gerolzhofen is twinned with:Partnerstädte, Official website Gerolzhofen * Mamers, France * Sè, Benin * Elek, Hungary * Rodewisch, Germany * Scarlino, Italy ==References== Category:Schweinfurt (district)
title: Gerolzhofen
